ygData.subject: Re: 1.14 & 3.2 java.net.SocketException: Socket is closed issue
ygData.msgSnippet: Heritrix 3.2 is very old and known to be buggy. I recommend trying an Internet Archive snapshot or the more recent Heritrix 3.3.0-LBS-2016-02 build (see
